summary: This is a declaration executed by counsel to the Acting United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York, affirming the truth of the preceding document's contents under penalty of perjury. It serves as a formal legal certification.
keyFacts: A declaration was executed on August 5, 2020, affirming the truth of a document's contents.
The declaration was made by counsel to the Acting United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.
The declaration was made under penalty of perjury pursuant to 28 U.S.C. ยง 1746.
